name: 'Jaws' marine ply bellyboard
description:
There's something in the water!!!

4ft bellyboard with blue hand painted shark graphics and logo.

The board is made from high grade FSC certified 9mm gaboon marine plywood and yacht varnished for durability.

All our boards are 12" wide tapering to 11" at the tail and have a slight nose kick to avoid pearling.  The Nose kick on this board is fairly slight, making it perfect for the small stuff!

Our marine ply boards are slightly lighter than our birch ply boards due to the characteristics of the wood.  both woods are high quality and hard wearing.

PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR BOARDS ARE NOT INTENDED TO BE USED AS FLOTATION AIDS OR FOR STAND UP SURFING.

All our boards are 12" wide tapering to 11" at the tail and have a slight nose kick to avoid pearling.

Our marine ply boards are slightly lighter than our birch ply boards due to the characteristics of the wood.  both woods are high quality and hard wearing.

name: blue stripe birch ply bellyboard
description:
4ft bellyboard with blue coloured hand painted stripe design and logo.

The board is made from high grade birch plywood then stained and yacht varnished for durability.

All our boards are 12" wide tapering to 11" at the tail and have a slight nose kick to avoid pearling.

Our birch boards are slightly heavier than our marine ply boards due to the characteristics of the wood.  both woods are high quality and hard wearing.

PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR BOARDS ARE NOT INTENDED TO BE USED AS FLOTATION AIDS OR FOR STAND UP SURFING.
